sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Scripts to update reference qualifiers and default values on program table</description>
        <name>ProgramManagementTokyoUpgrade</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var start = new GlideDateTime();
gs.log("Starting of ProgramManagementTokyoUpgrade , time : "+start);
var progMgmtTHelper = new ProgramManagementTokyoUpgradeHelper();
progMgmtTHelper.updateReferenceQualifierOnProgram('business_unit');
progMgmtTHelper.updateReferenceQualifierOnProgram('portfolio');
progMgmtTHelper.updateReferenceQualifierOnProgram('department');
progMgmtTHelper.updateDefaultValueOnProgram('business_unit');
progMgmtTHelper.updateDefaultValueOnProgram('portfolio');
progMgmtTHelper.updateDefaultValueOnProgram('department');
var end = new GlideDateTime();
gs.log("Ending of ProgramManagementTokyoUpgrade , time : "+end);
gs.log("Total time taken for ProgramManagementTokyoUpgrade in millisecs : "+(end.getNumericValue() - start.getNumericValue()));]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-06-23 07:30:35</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>aa06a489eb1011105509b5bf1a522892</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ProgramManagementTokyoUpgrade</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Program Management" source="com.snc.program_management">1110926b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d433e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_aa06a489eb1011105509b5bf1a522892</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-06-24 08:06:14</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
